name: Project Snowstorm
blurb: MMORPG with Real-Time Pet Battles, Expansive 3D World and Ranked Individual & Guild PvP arenas all on your mobile device!

rewards.reward: No Reward

A thank you email from the SnowFury Studios team that includes a digital Augmented Reality (AR) postcard. Download the AR app, point your phone or tablet's camera at the image we send you and a 3D model character will pop to life above the page.  == PLEASE NOTE == A digital copy of the game is now included in all contribution tiers $5 and above ==

=== Earlybird Kickstarter - Tier 1 ===\r\nA special in-game VANITY ITEM only available through Kickstarter- wear it with honor! You\u2019ll also receive a special SILVER EDITION invitation to our PUBLIC FORUM and a thank you note with a digital AR POSTCARD.

======= Kickstarter - Tier 2 =======\r\nTier 1 + A special quarterly email with updates from the development team with a NEW 3D AR CARD giving you a sneak peek into the latest developments, plus all the items in the previous tiers.

======= Kickstarter - Tier 3 =======\r\nTier 2 + A digital download of a Kickstarter exclusive extended scene video, the Project Snowstorm SOUNDTRACK by Veigar Margeirsson (digital) and MAKING OF PROJECT SNOWSTORM (digital), WALLPAPER, IMAGES, RINGTONES, plus items from previous reward tiers.

======== Gamer - Tier 1 ========\r\nKickstarter Tier 3 + Exclusive Elemental Dragon for Kickstarter backers only! Any hybrids created with this dragon will retain its unique Kickstarter skin. + NOVELLA - ETERNAL WRATH by Edward Willett (digital) + GAME GUIDE (digital).

======== Gamer - Tier 2 ========\r\nFirst tier with physical rewards! Gamer Tier 1 + an EXCLUSIVE designed Project Snowstorm skin for your iPhone or Galaxy phone from Skinit!  A Kickstarter Consumables Pack (digital) that helps you get off to a blazing start in the game.

======== Gamer - Tier 3 ========\r\nGamer Tier 2 +  Get a new, physical postcard with additional 3D AR content mailed to you quarterly. A SnowFury Studios BASEBALL CAP, A Kickstarter Consumables Pack referral code that lets you BRING A FRIEND into the action,  when your friend completes the game's intro tutorial you'll receive a special in game reward too!

=== Gamer - Tier 4: Pro-Gamer ===\r\nGamer Tier 3 + BETA KEY that grants you early access to Project Snowstorm, inclusion in the GOLD LEVEL game credits, Project Snowstorm T-SHIRT, the opportunity to help us put the finishing touches on gameplay, story, and balance!

======= Collectors Edition =======\r\nTier 4: Pro-Gamer + BOX SET that includes: Collector\u2019s Edition Spirit Realm Creature (digital), Collector\u2019s AR Cards with background & stats on key creatures, a PRINTED MAP of the game, a FLASH DRIVE KIT of Project Snowstorm downloadables.
=== Collectors Edition Platinum ===\r\nTier 4: Pro-Gamer + A box set SIGNED BY the development team, a collector\u2019s edition PERSONAL AR CARD that shows your latest in-game creature, and EARBUDS!

== Earlybird: First 200 Supporters ==\r\nCollector's Edition Platinum Tier + participate in our NDA BEHIND THE SCENES community + PLATINUM GAME CREDITS. Interact with the development team on special projects including: feedback on early game, character, terrain & building designs; give us feedback on skill trees & PARTICIPATE in early releases and focus groups.

=Behind the Scenes Access: Limited=\r\nLast chance to be a part of the Project Snowstorm team and participate in our NDA BEHIND THE SCENES community - hurry before this limited availability item is gone! Includes the Collector's Edition PLATINUM Tier + participate in our NDA BEHIND THE SCENES community + PLATINUM GAME CREDITS. Interact with the development team on special projects including: feedback on early game, character, terrain & building designs; give us feedback on skill trees & PARTICIPATE in early releases and focus groups.

======= Ultimate Gamer =======\r\nCollector's Edition Platinum Tier + an awesome SFS HOODIE, a COFFEE TABLE BOOK with an AR-enabled BEASTIARY, a TABLET SLEEVE, PLATINUM forum badge and In-Game Recognition in the ULTIMATE GAMER section of the credits!

====== Ultimate Collector ======\r\nCollector\u2019s Edition Platinum Tier + LIMITED EDITION SCULPTURE recreation of an epic Eternal, Elemental or Spirit Realm boss, hand-numbered and signed by the artist!

== Behind the Scenes: Item Design (giftable) ==
Create a rare item, weapon or artifact used in Project Snowstorm.* Gift pack includes documents and instructions for our item design process, a 1:1 call with our design team, an epic illustration of your creation signed by the artist & development team, 10 additional Kickstarter Consumable Packs for friends, plus Collector's Edition PLATINUM rewards.   Gift pack will ship in time for Christmas 2013. 

*Within the scope and lore of Project Snowstorm with our team approval

== Behind the Scenes: Character Design (giftable) == \r\nBecome an in-game character that will be used in Project Snowstorm* Gift pack includes documents and instructions for our design process, a 1:1 call with our design team, an epic illustration of your creation signed by the artist & development team, 10 additional Kickstarter Consumable Pack codes for friends, plus Collector's Edition PLATINUM rewards. Gift pack will ship in time for Christmas 2013. *Within the scope and lore of Project Snowstorm with our team approval
== Behind the Scenes: Costume Design (giftable) ==\r\nFocused on Costume design with the same reward structure as \u201cBehind the Scenes: Character Design\u201d
== Behind the Scenes: Boss Design (giftable) ==\r\nFocused on Boss Design with the same reward structure as Behind the Scenes: Character Design

== Behind the Scenes: Lore (giftable) ==\r\nSteer the backstory and fate of a character within Project Snowstorm* Gift pack includes documents and instructions for our item design process, a 1:1 call with AWARD-WINNING SCI-FI WRITER ED WILLET, an epic illustration of your creation signed by Ed & development team, inclusion in Lore Master game credits, 10 additional Kickstarter Consumable Pack codes for friends, plus Collector's Edition PLATINUM rewards. Gift pack will ship in time for Christmas 2013. *Within the scope and lore of Project Snowstorm with our team approval

== Behind the Scenes: Music & Sound (giftable) ==\r\nCo-develop one of the music tracks within Project Snowstorm* Gift pack includes documents and instructions for our item design process, a 1:1 CALL WITH HOLLYWOOD COMPOSER VEIGAR MARGEIRSSON, co-creator in game credits, 10 additional Kickstarter Consumable Pack codes for friends, plus Collector's Edition PLATINUM rewards. Gift pack will ship in time for Christmas 2013. *Within the scope and lore of Project Snowstorm with our team approval
